section.p: To use serviced, you need a login account on hosts in pools. The account needs to be a member of the docker group.
You may invoke serviced from the master host or a resource pool host. For example, to list the services running on the master host, enter the following command:
If you invoke serviced on a resource pool host, you must specify the master host and port manually, using the endpoint global option.
Replace Master-Host with the hostname or IP address of the master host.
section.note: To commit a container, a serviced CLI session must be run on the master host.
